subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Greg Gantt may be best known for having two of his punts blocked and returned for touchdowns in a 1972 loss to Auburn in the so-called Punt, ’Bama, Punt game.
snippet: Greg Gantt may be best known for having two of his punts blocked and returned for touchdowns in a 1972 loss to Auburn in the so-called Punt, ’Bama, Punt game.
